entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0004.9287] [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities] with a value of 0 is not equal to the combined total of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations] and Net cash used in financing activities from discontinued operations ( -175,057 + 0 ) with a value of -175,057.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities fact are: Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities] : 0 Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations] : 0 Decimals of Net cash used in financing activities from discontinued operations : 0
Rule Element Id:9287 Rule version: 26.0.9 - tptw_10q.htm 2

property.name: label
property.value: [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities]
